title: Bread: A Sweet Surrender: The Musical Journey of David Gates, James Griffin & Co.
description: Researched in detail, Bread: A Sweet Surrender includes exclusive interviews with founding member Robb Royer, along with friends, family, and former musical associates of the band. This first-ever biography of Bread reveals the story behind the group members' formative years, their coming together, the rise of Bread, and the subsequent break-up and the messy lawsuits that were to dog them in later years. Also features exclusive insights into their successful but short-lived 1990s reunion.Malcolm C. Searles is a freelance rock music writer and lifelong Bread fan. He lives and works in Essex, United Kingdom.
author: Malcolm C. Searles
